title: FS: Oddball Dark Cap Piedmont Christy Mathewson PSA 5 M/C
author: robw1959

posts.post_title: FS: Oddball Dark Cap Piedmont Christy Mathewson PSA 5 M/C
posts.post_content: Here is a Topps '54 styled T206 Christy Mathewson. Just about the most vibrant colors I've ever seen for this card. Asking a net payment of $625 delivered. PayPal preferred, but flexible to other payment types as well.
